title: Jhin theory (idk if u guys came up with this before)
body:
so for jhin the new releases such as the pictures of zed vi garen and sona are links i think. 

Sona lost her voice thus the spiritual thing from her mouth.

Zed lost his mind ( figuratively and literally)

Garen lost his heart ( to kat )

Vi - idk

replies.body:
Yep made a little theory about this.
http://boards.oce.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/player-creations/ELgUxYam-jhindeadeyemy-theory


I also figured that jhin is the champion's name but deadeye is most likely a skin line for Garen,Vi,Zed,Jhin,Sona.
If you notice that in the teaser all the elements are involved 
Zed - Earth
Sona - Air
Garen - Water
Vi - Fire

So most likely the full name would be something like
"Jhin, Master Of Elements"

Again these are just my thoughts.
deadeye an jhin is most likely not his real in game name
Vi lost the power to contain herself. With those gauntlets on she always wants to punch stuff.
